title: PNY XLR8 CS3140 1TB M.2 NVMe Gen4 x4 Internal Solid State Drive (SSD) with Heatsink - M280CS3140HS-1TB-RB
features: Upgrade your M.2 PCIe Gen4 enabled computer to enjoy the extreme performance you demand
The NVMe PCIe Gen4 x4 interface delivers exceptional performance of up to 7,500MB/s seq. read and 5,650MB/s seq. write speeds; slower when equipped in PCIe Gen3 x4 motherboards
The enhanced bandwidth of the NVMe Gen4 interface allows for extreme performance and low latency, making it superior to SATA based SSD’s
Integrated extruded aluminum heatsink offers improved thermal performance for demanding applications, high end games, and intense workloads
Backed by a 5-Year Limited Warranty or TBW with support from our US based technical support team
For PS5, purchase the CS3140 non-heatsink version and add a heatsink that meets Sony’s requirements.
description: The CS3140 M.2 NVMe Gen4 x4 Solid State Drive is designed to be an extreme high performance SSD to deliver the performance you demand for your laptop or desktop system. It is the ideal solution for PC enthusiasts, gamers, and video rendering professionals to upgrade to the latest in NVMe technology. The NVMe Gen4 x4 interface delivers incredible performance of up to 7,500MB/s seq. read and 5,650MB/s seq. write speeds and the optional integrated extruded aluminum heatsink offers improved thermal performance for demanding applications, high end games, and intense workloads. Boot up in seconds, enjoy lightning fast application launches, and incredible system performance. The PNY XLR8 CS3140 is highly durable, less likely to fail, and supports a 5-year limited warranty or TBW.
